comment: Take her for your Senior Seminar! She was amazing and did not overload you with busy work. I was able to focus on my transition out of college without the added stress of being overworked. Thank you for a great final semester in college!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Smith was wonderful! She had clear outlines for my ISD senior seminar online course. You are graded  by a few discussion posts, then a final research project and a career project. Both are pretty easy if you get a jump start on them. I never felt overwhelmed in this class and we had plenty of time to complete our final projects!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: Avoid taking this class. Avoid,avoid,avoid.

Professor Smith was great, I enjoyed her class. You have to participate by reading and watching all of the criteria, as long as you do that you'll do just fine. She is very responsive and wants to see her students succeed. I would definitely take her again, I gained a lot from her class.

Professor Deborah Smith was a good asset towards my semester. the assignments are pretty easy, but it is a lot of sourcessuch as articles and TED talksto view, but they are pretty intriguing and make you rethink certain bad habits you may potentially have. I enjoyed this class, very interesting, she's very organized and provides short lectures.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Worse class Ive ever taken. Avoid avoid avoid!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She is a really solid professor, but she is probably the worst choice if you want an easy class, which KSU1101 should be. I took 4 other classes and this was the class I had to do the most in. However, she is really nice and you get some free grades a long the way.
She is a good teacher but there are some things I do not personally understand in her class. She is a positive person and she keeps you busy.

Deborah means well, but she takes the KSU1101 class way too seriously - asking for 3 campus events (which is easy to knock out) as well as 15 hours of volunteer work (which isn't easy if you're working and going to school). She sometimes will work with you - but if you are one point away from an A, don't expect the bump.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Professor Smith requires 20 volunteer hours outside of class where only certain events are allowed through a website she approves. This means you actually have to do the hours and can't make them up. Homework is taken up every single class too. This class is not easy especially for a KSU 1101 class.

First of all KSU 1101 is a pointless class to begin with but having this professor makes it 10 times worse. Shes honestly a good lady but takes this class way to seriously. She talks for the entire class about the most basic common sense stuff then assigns even more pointless homework to follow it. 2/10 recommend
She doesn't tell you when things are due and her syllabus is not accurate to what she says (due dates/assignment outlines.) She definitely doesn't need to be teaching a freshman class.
Terrible class. I wouldn't won't my worst  enemy to take her class. Test are a joke just like her this lady shouldn't be teaching a total waste. Stay away.

Ive taken SEVERAL online classes and will say this one is probably the worst. She grades extremely hard. Midterm is a joke its so hard. Open book or not. Can't find anything anywhere. Didn't learn anything. Pointless and hard. Would not suggest taking her at all.

I took Dr. Smith for an 8 week, online course. She is very accessible and wants you to succeed. She is prompt in responding to emails and offers appropriate feedback. There were 3 discussion board posts, a project, two papers and a midterm and a final. If you do the work you should make an A. Highly recommend this professor.

Online class! Three major assignments-group project, "book report", and multicultural experience. Easy class and wants her students to succeed. Midterm is over the readings in the book, final is over final readings and group project study guides.

Very nice! will help you in any way possible! read the book!!!! projects are very easy, test are very hard!!!! otherwise great teacher. She is very timely getting your grades back to you, and is very quick with emails! I'm taking her again!!! :)

Dr. Smith is very helpful and smart.  She designed the class so we could experience alot of leadership situations.  We had guest speakers and we did an obstacle course.  Very pleasant and soft spoken.  Her final was hard so study.

Dr. Smith was a great teacher.  The assignments were easy to understand.  She is very understanding about family situations.  She had guest speakers and the class had to do a mandatory obstacle exercise at Jolley Lodge.  You will learn alot about leadership if that is your thing.

pointless class... dont do anything in the class then it comes to the midterm which is open book but still really hard and asks random questions and then the final rolls around and it sucks... half of my class failed the final.... DO NOT TAKE HER!!! YOU WILL NOT GET AN A!!!

tests are hard, need to know chap ideas. open book midterm. pay attention anything written on board. sort of a mother hen, actually cares if you're there.  always have enough time to do big projects, just got to do them. easy elective class, otherwise avoid cause didn't really get anything from it

I found the class to be extremely pointless and boring. Mrs. Smith was never really helpful and often lost my assignments that I turned in on time, and then told me that i would not get full credit for them. Over all she had to be the worst teacher for me that semester. By the way never call her Mrs. she will correct you on the spot, "its Dr.".
very nice teacher.  however, ksu 1101 is a joke avoid taking that class at all if you can.  It is a basically making you pay for what you learned for free in high school.

This a pointless class that most would take as an easy elective. Her first "test" is nothing more than an open book word hunt. If you have problems with time when taking tests (ADD, OCD) then you are out of luck. Many students could not finish the test in time but this prof. still grades like its a freakin' thesis! Take Dominic for this class!
very easy class... no talent needed to teach it though... open book midterm... no real work... easy to communicate with... cool teacher

Dr. Smith is a great teacher. She is very thorough with directions but still lets you do what you can do with your own creativity. Her Midterm is open book just make sure you write down the small amount of notes you'll take. She also releases class early alot.
loved her. she made the tests sound hard but they were easy. dont study but do all the work and read and i mean read the material. dont study it but take time in reading it. easy A

nice lady. class was totally easy, except for tests were open book but not very helpful if you threw the flyers away. I came to class almost everyday and i had a A up until the final. can you believe you have a final in KSU 1101? did bad on final and I got a B. other classes final was telling the class what they learned,want an A take someone else
easy teacher very laid back and cool; the only way you can get a c or lower is by not doing any work...hell i didnt even do 1 assignment and i still made a B in the class

Dr. Smith is a very nice woman. She is very eager to help myself and other freshman become better students by teaching us time/stress management, etc. So far the class has been a wonderful experience for me. I highly recommend Dr. Smith. Will take her again if the opportunity arises!
